topic.title: can not login to zerotalk
topic.body:
the log its self is a bit long so i just copied and pasted what looked like a error
im more of a server and network guy then a coder how ever it kind of looks like a connectoin error

1604064816_mirrored_lostfile_github.body: come to think about it i dont have sqlite installed but then again i dont think it needs to be
